trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the size of the image on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> is automatically adjusted to fit on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> while retaining the original image proportions.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se o tamanho da imagem em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> é automaticamente ajustado para se ajustar em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> enquanto retém as proporções originais da imagem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> properties pertain to various aspects of image handling.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> propriedades pertencem aos vários aspectos da manipulação de imagem.

trans-unit.source: Use images in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time–only <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Usar imagens em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controles, como definir essas propriedades diretamente ou definindo a execução de tempo – somente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, as follows:
trans-unit.target: Escala da imagem é determinado pela interação de propriedades no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, da seguinte maneira:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> setting and the container's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> é a escala da imagem final conforme determinado pela combinação da imagem do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> configuração e o contêiner <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> configuração.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `true` (the default) and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is SizeToFit, no image scaling occurs, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit> size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> é `true` (o padrão) e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> é SizeToFit, nenhuma imagem escala ocorre e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit> é de tamanho do maior item ou um determinado tamanho mínimo.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `false` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is None, neither image nor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> scaling occurs.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> é `false` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> é nenhuma, nenhuma imagem nem <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> escala ocorre.

trans-unit.source: To control the image size, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para controlar o tamanho da imagem, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following code example applies the SizeToFit member to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir aplica-se o membro SizeToFit um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the size of the image on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> is not automatically adjusted to fit on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que o tamanho da imagem em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> não é automaticamente ajustado para se ajustar em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the size of the image on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> is automatically adjusted to fit on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que o tamanho da imagem em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> é automaticamente ajustado para se ajustar em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
